Title: 196: How Parents and Teachers Can teach Empathy and Empowerment in the Aftermath of Tragedy
Description:
Joe Mazza shares how parents can help students have empathy and become empowered changemakers in the face of tragedy. In this special show, we give tips to parents and teachers about things they can do this season to help kids serve others affected by tragedy.
